amendment.description: Amendments consisting of amendments numbered 4 and 5 printed Part B of House Report 114-818. See page D1054 of the Congressional Record of November 17, 2016 for a description of amendments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendments (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 237 (Roll no. 583).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Mr. Connolly.
